website_summaries.verdict: Gentle and engineered for multiple health benefits.
pros: We love that this supplement is a glycinate versus a taurate, which can be easier to digest and absorb
Formulated to act quickly without upsetting your stomach
Reviewers report both physical and mental health benefits such as reducing anxiety to heart palpitations
Easy to blend into a smoothie as well
cons: May not provide relief from severe muscle aches

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula - includes magnesium oxide!
customer_reviews.text: Changed the formula so that it's not chelated and includes magnesium oxide. Very disappointed they changed the product and are riding on the old positive reviews. I'll be insisting on a refund and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Not pure glycinate — false advertising
customer_reviews.text: These used to be in capsules and were labeled as pure magnesium glycinate. I re-ordered months later and they are now tablets and relabeled as a combination of glycinate and oxide, which they don’t list the ratios of. I will be buying my Magnesium elsewhere from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bargar

customer_reviews.title: THEY CHANGED THE FORMULATION!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! They switched the formulation from PURE, 100% glycinate to a mixture of glycinate and oxide but, even if asked, they will not reveal how much is oxide. AND they sell it for the same price!! It took forever to find a product that had 100% glycinate, and was thrilled when I found this one. I bought my 2nd bottle and after a couple days of getting diarrhea, looked at the label and saw they added oxide to the formula. It's very upsetting. I am not supposed to take oxide due to GI problems. ZHOU, PLEASE CHANGE BACK TO 100% GLYCINATE!!
customer_reviews.author: Zozarrian

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent business practice, bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. I was ecstatic to find an affordable source of Magnesium Glycinate from a seemingly trustworthy brand, but no longer. They have quietly switched out their formula to a proprietary blend (meaning they refuse to disclose the ratio of individual ingredients) containing the incredibly cheap laxative magnesium oxide. Magnesium oxide is not known to have many of the benefits magnesium glycinate confers as it passes right through you, hence the laxative effect. This supplement is no longer worth the label it's wrapped in and is potentially dangerous to unsuspecting consumers who believe they are reaping the benefits of bioavailable magnesium. Shame on Zhou Nutrition!
customer_reviews.author: S. Harry

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, I'm so angry. I used to use and love Zhou magnesium glycinate. But I hit reorder and what showed up is not the same. It's not capsules anymore and it totally doesn't work to prevent cramps. Then I looked, its not even pure magnesium glycinate anymore!
customer_reviews.author: BeccTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I have anxiety almost on a daily basis and at ...
customer_reviews.text: I have anxiety almost on a daily basis and at times panick attacks. After some research I started taking this (about 5 weeks ago). The first 10 days, only one per day since I eat my fruits and vegetables every day. I figured that I am already getting at least half of the magnesium I need through foods I eat. I didn't feel any difference. So I decided to follow the instructions and take 2 per day. After about a week of taking 2 per day is when I started to feel the difference. No anxiety and I feel a lot calmer. I actually went through an entire week without anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What Happened??? I really liked these caplets - easy to swallow, BUT NOW THEY ARE GIANT TABLETS?!?!?!??
customer_reviews.text: What Happened? I really liked these caplets - They were easy to swallow, and help keep my muscles from over tensing, preventing calves from seizing at night. I was really happy with this product. We ran out so I re-ordered. While I was sent the SAME bottle, only it contained GIANT hard TABLETS inside - what happened to those easy to swallow veggie caps?!?!?! Please, Please bring back the veggie caplets!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: I think there must be a laxative substance in this brand. I have never had an issue prior with other glycinate brands. Had severe cramping and explosive diarrhea for days. Appears many others have experienced he same symptoms. Surprised this product is still being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: formula now have Magnesium Oxide
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before in capsule form containg 450 mg of Magnesium Glycinate/2 caps. What I received is in tablet form with unspecified percentage of Magnesium Oxide. I would like to return this, since I have problem with Magnesium Oxide
customer_reviews.author: LiveToBe160

customer_reviews.title: I thought that I was buying magnesium glycinate. False ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I was buying magnesium glycinate. False advertising. This not not pure glycinate. Oxide is the cheap form you buy at the grocery store. And they won't tell you how much oxide is in their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Bait and switch? Read the ingredients before buying, this is a blend of glycinate and oxide, with no mention of how much of each.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointed in Zhou. Product changed
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product until they changed it. Previous ingredient listed as Chelated Magnesium Glycinate, new label says Magnesium Glycinate AND Magnesium Oxide. Previous order was in easy to swallow capsule form and now it is a huge tablet. Very, very disappointed in Zhou. I really feel like this was a bait and switch considering I ordered by using the link from one of my previous orders.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Warning BAIT and SWITCH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this used to be a good product and they changed it from being pure magnesium glycinate to a rip-off magnesium glycinate mixed with magnesium oxide and they switch to tablets without telling anyone! Won't purchase again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mightyjoe

customer_reviews.title: The formula has changed and no longer helps me
customer_reviews.text: *Update on July 15, 2018 BUYER BEWARE* I started to get leg cramps again and my daughter has been having trouble sleeping. So I did some investigating. I saw some reviews about the formula and pill size changing. I have 2 bottles at home from 2 previous orders and they both have slightly different ingredients and are made in different locations. Now the ingredients are different yet again compared to the ingredients listed in the pictures from the manufacturer! I will not be ordering again from Zhou Nutrition! The magnesium works well. I don’t get leg cramps at night anymore and it helps me sleep at night too.
customer_reviews.author: jondea

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely think this is a great product. I was looking for a magensium supplement after using epsom baths for muscle recovery and this product is everything I couldn’t asked for. I noticed a significant difference in my sleep which was a huge bonus since I was having restless sleeps and a lot of pain getting out of bed in the morning. Magnesium is great for muscle recovery, stress, sleep, and overall an integral nutrient. I highly recommend this product and this brand as I have used many of theirsupplements.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Baum

customer_reviews.title: Formulation Change
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! Product formulation has been changed to include magnesium oxide...CHEAP!!!!! And on top of that, they're huge horse pills, instead of the caps they used to be. Will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the chelated form they had in a capsule. When I ordered again, it came as a giant tablet that i cannot swallow without breaking up. It bothers my stomach now and is not as pure as it used to be. The label looks almost the same, but it is not pure. I feel cheated and will be returning if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because I had read that it would help with my joint pain and planter fasciitis. It took about a week to really help but it has worked wonders! The bonus is that it has also helped me with falling asleep at bedtime. No more tossing and turning trying to get rest. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Changed formula.
customer_reviews.text: Changed the formula. No longer chelated . It’s terrible!! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: RandKris

customer_reviews.title: Loved the capsules. Hate tablets. Beware before reordering!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the capsules. Hate tablets. Be sure if you reorder to check that while using same packaging, they without notice now send large tablets. Which will cause more GI upset. Will be returning and use other product. Used capsules for some time.Plus have suggested to many people I will be giving them a heads up since nothing put out by the company using same packaging as the capsules.
customer_reviews.author: G Bills

customer_reviews.title: they have changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these and they were in capsule form and worked well. I got my order in last week and they are now LARGE pills that are not all that easy to swallow and do not seem to work as well. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING RE-ORDER NOT SAME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I did a re-order thinking I was getting the pure Magnesium Glycinate veggie capsules like I have previously ordered for over a year. Got a completely different version of TABLETS, that are huuuggeee. Not to mention now there is added oxide, but the actual amount is not listed in the nutritional information. Do not recommend. ETA: I am now using another brand I found called Naturebell.
customer_reviews.author: KachinaDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for Keto.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been changed by the manufacturer, it wad formerly chelated magnesium glycinate, now it is a magnesium complex containing magnesium oxide. Magnesium oxide is not nearly as bioavailable. This product is now very inferior compared to the previous version by the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING formula, DIARRHEA - BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for magnesium glycinate it usually means you have done your research. Glycinate is the best form of magnesium to take for maximum absorption and minimal to zero diarrhea. LET IT BE KNOWN that these clowns have misled everyone by labeling this as Mag Glycinate even though the nutrition info on the back says its a COMBINATION OF GLYCINATE AND OXIDE. This product is total b.s. and should be retitled by amazon. Even if you take it as recommended YOU WILL STILL HAVE DIARRHEA. Look elsewhere for glycinate - amazon has plenty of other choices.
customer_reviews.author: nealparadise

customer_reviews.title: Not like the older product
customer_reviews.text: I had used an older version of this product with great results. It eliminated leg cramps with little to mo laxative effect. That product was all glycinate. This new "substitute" is blended with oxide and does not eliminate my leg cramps, but it is a wonderful laxative...unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cushman Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product description
customer_reviews.text: Twice I've ordered the capsule version of this product and twice I've received the tablets. The description states it's a capsule but once you click on it the product changes to tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Troost

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for awhile now. I just got my recent order and it was not capsules...they are tablets and there is oxide added to the glycinate. Why did you change formulas! I want to return my full bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Jules.

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula, not pure Glycinate anymore - what a JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: So Zhou nutrition changed formula - now it contains unspecified amount of magnesium OXIDE - totally inferior form of magnesium. This should NOT even be the same product in my opinion. How can they call it "Magnesium Glycinate 450 mg" if there is not 450mg of Glycinate in 1 serving- misleading. I too just reordered once good product, to get this ... Not to mention what once used to be nice size capsule is now big tablet. Such a disappointment. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the same product I ordered before - but as others had said now the product is giant pills and different formulation.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Just started taking Magnesium as recommended by my neurologist for migraine relief
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking Magnesium as recommended by my neurologist for migraine relief. Due to other health issues, it was recommended that I take magnesium glycerinate, so I ordered this after reading the reviews. I am already noticing that I am sleeping better, feel like I have more energy and am having less migraine issues. Hopefully over time my migraine issues will lessen even more (my neuro said it could take a month or more to experience the full effect). So far, I'm VERY satisfied!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Walter

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula
customer_reviews.text: Product formula changed. Used to be all magnesium glucinate, now is magnesium "blend" which includes magnesium oxide(terrible bio availability).
customer_reviews.author: max jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After receiving amazing results for my photosensitivity using magnesium, when my original bottle ran out I thought I would try this brand as it was ab $20 cheaper. And after all, it says glycinate. Well, it is not only glycinate but also oxide and my photo sensitivity went raging again after a few weeks of using this product. Would not recommend as they are giving false information and it doesn’t work whatsoever. Waste of money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!! Ingredient changes! Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Changed ingredients! No longer capsule but horse pill. Oxide is garbage! Kick myself for not double checking for changes and I already opened the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw it in the trash
customer_reviews.text: I would return it but the return window is closed. Our experience with this Mag Glycinate includes severe abdominal cramps and multiple trips to the bathroom. We've tried many other brands of Magnesium Glycinate and never had a poor result. This will be thrown out to avoid more tummy troubles.
customer_reviews.author: KBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% magnesium glycinate ... mixed with magnesium oxide
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Was instructed to get magnesium glycinate by my neurologist. The front of the states magnesium glycinate only but in a tiny font on the back it states magnesium glycinate and magnesium oxide. It doesn’t even break down how many mg are coming from those two sources. I thought buying a certified product would provide assurance that I was getting what I paid for. Not true!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Seen no benefit so far. Gone through one bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Sep 4, 2018: Just got my 2nd bottle and they are tablets! The product description still says capsules. Previous order history points to the current tablet version page so it looks like you ordered tablets last time instead of capsules. Also shocked to read comments of formulation changes. Zhou needs to make a statement and tell us home much of it is actual magnesium. So tired of these companies scamming us. Amazon has to do something about these bad actors! Seen no benefit so far. Gone through one bottle but has not helped with muscle cramping nor any benefit experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: I reordered what previously was pure chelated magnesium glycinate capsules, and I what I received was magnesium oxide horse pills slightly altered verbiage on the front of the label. I really don't appreciate the bait and switch! It's crazy how "on guard" we have to be in order to be healthy. Never again will I shop with this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Desruisseaux

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED FORMULA!
customer_reviews.text: They used have a gel cap but it is now a solid (full of filler, I might add) HORSEPILL. Returning today!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chorak

customer_reviews.title: Formula change and now tablets!
customer_reviews.text: Reordered thinking I was getting the same thing I always buy and was surprised to find formula change and also that I received tablets. When I pulled this up, it said, "Your ordered this on X date" so I thought I was buying the same thing. Not so. Unfortunately I didn't realize until I opened it up that it was different.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered before
customer_reviews.text: These are not what I ordered before. (See photo - original capsule on the right, current tablet on the left) I got capsules before and this time they sent these huge tablets. They are about the same length but much wider and not as slick. They don't absorb the way the powder filled capsules do and that makes them much less effective. The capsules were much easier to swallow too. But mostly I just really wish they would absorb better. I am extremely disappointed. I don't take these for sleep so I don't know what effect these have that way, so neutral rating there.
customer_reviews.author: Delhazan

customer_reviews.title: Major dammage on arival lable and expiration date unreadable can't stand upright
customer_reviews.text: While this may be a great Magnesium G supplement the packaging is unreadable cannot see or read any expiration date bottom of plastic bottle has major budge and bottle cannot stand upright on any flat counter the packaging is a ZERO on quality control while the Vitamin inside may be 100% beneficial to your health I most likely will buy this vitamin supplement again but not from this distributor again
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula
customer_reviews.text: They completely changed there product yet it isn't stated anywhere on the description...going back. HORRIBLE!! **pill on left was from previous bottle and right - new bottle**
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i would not recommend this product any longer.
customer_reviews.text: Note the update. This works amazing. Have tried many mag supplements none work. This you can feel in your muscles and with spasms with in 24 hours. Update to my original post. I changed my rating. I reordered this product. Unknown to me they changed it to a horse tablet. As a nurse I've seen thousands of X-rays with tablets sitting in digestive tracts. I'm totally disappointed of the change without notice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a capsule , huge tablet
customer_reviews.text: Product description shows capsules . Seller commented on questions saying capsules could be opened. Product delivered is a huge tablet that I can’t swallow . Bought product specially to break open into a shake and now have a bottle of unusable giant horse pills :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keep

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed fall 2018.
customer_reviews.text: The formula changed to include magnesium oxide. And is now in tablet form (was previously capsules). Bottle also now adds warning "excessive magnesium may cause diarrhea"...that was not on previous order without the oxide. Hmmm. I had set up as subscribe and save but am cancelling now that i noticed this switcheroo. Too bad since i was liking some of the other products they were promoting but now they've lost my trust.
customer_reviews.author: MRJ

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Bait and Switch Now Giant horse pills different formula!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I reordered for the 3rd time only to find that I received a bottle of huge hard to swallow horse pills. I’m so bummed plus the formula changed! Why?????? This should NOT be listed as a reorder of the same item as it is not the same. I’m done with this and now searching for a new product similar to the old. Why did you change???? Losing this customer! I’m furious!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Walgrave

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to help heal my strained back, definitely think it made a difference, enough so I will be continuing to take it daily for the foreseeable future! A+ product
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife started taking this a few weeks ago and really likes the way she feels now. Less anxious, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Switched product
customer_reviews.text: I reordered these after previously purchasing. They are completely different and they are causing diarrhea. I am not happy that they would not notify or clearly label the change.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyannsmith

customer_reviews.title: changed formula, not the same as what i purchased in April 2018
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy that this product has changed. Mid December I re-ordered the magnesium (chelate) that I had purchased thru Amazon in April, but this product arrived instead. When I click on my order from April to try to re-order, it takes me to this newly formulated product. I've been taking it for over a week now as I thought I'd just give it a try. I take in the evening before bed, I have woken up with a stomach ache every morning since. This is the only change I have made in last week & a half. It is clear this is not working in my body the way the original product did. Unhappy. Going to search for new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Formula Change/False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Product use to be 100% Glycinate. Now they mix in Oxide, which is basically useless. This product should be pulled until they change the front label. Only way to tell this change was to read the back label. Would not have realized the product change but I got a message it was no longer available by Subscription & Save and then saw the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Howard

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but a good product
customer_reviews.text: I had vsg (bariatric) surgery and eat a lot of protein and tend to constipated even with the two prescribed stool softeners and 64oz of water I take/consume each day. So, I was recommended these by Tammy @ketochaos on YouTube and Instagram and began taking two everyday and dang does it ever work each day that I actually take them and don’t actually forget. price is expensive but it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: tammysvsgjourney

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The original formulation was excellent, pure mg glycinate. This version is a hard-to-swallow tablet that has mixture of magnesium products in it with the predictable irritant effects on your colon. Sad but a great product is no longer great. Don't buy it! steve
customer_reviews.author: Steven E

customer_reviews.title: A well formulated product.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed pretty quickly it’s aide in better sleep shortly after starting it. I like the calming affects of magnesium and this does it well. I recommend this magnesium highly.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Newland

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to provide magnesium like other mag supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Andslat

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as named - magnesium oxide
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this product as a supplement to offset the magnesium depleting effects of prograf On my most recent reorder the supplements came in tablet versus capsule form. I took one and in a few hours I had gi effects. I looked at the label and the front still said magnesium glycinate but the ingredient label said magnesium (in the form of magnesium glycinate and magnesium oxide). So they re formulated the supplement and included the cheaper magnesium oxide that has a laxative effect. Disappointed and trying to find a replacement. Seems like they should relabel the product to be truthful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product
customer_reviews.text: First month I ordered and got capsules and I loved the product! This month I got tablets and it is not the same product at all. I am getting a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan & Sam

customer_reviews.title: changed formula
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking the capsule type of this for a year with good success in controlling palpitations. I took two a day and no palpitations. a couple months ago I notice the capsule was now a solid pill and I have had a couple episodes of palpitations. I was going to order some and started reading about formula change when a light bulb went off. No wonder this is not working for me as before they changed the type of magnesium which I do not absorb as well. So long Zhou Nutrition I am switching to a chelated form Mg
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: Dishonest company switched the ingredients, size of pills and went from capsules to hard tablet horse pills without mentioning it in description anywhere! Not a safe choice to take these now! Should've told buying customers of change! Sent these pills back immediately!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Not pure mag glycinate!!
customer_reviews.text: Bait & switch on this product! Returning it as it is not as advertised. Changed formulation to include mag oxide & changed to tablet from capsule. Previous purchase of this product was not like this product just received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: My life is better after using this product...seriously
customer_reviews.text: I take 2 pills once a day after eating a meal. I'm almost done with m first bottle. While I believe that the placebo effect is definitely a thing, I do also attribute this to my sudden ability to push through higher volume sets of wide-grip pullups before my muscles to begin giving out. I used to be unable to push past a certain threshold every time for years. Now that I'm taking this that is suddenly not the case. Additionally, I feel that it may have contributed to my recent feeling of increased testosterone (never got it tested, just going off of how I feel).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Helps with leg cramps!
customer_reviews.text: Since taking it in the evening I’ve had zero leg/foot cramps while trying to sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Delene G. Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was buying
customer_reviews.text: I carefully read the description when ordering to make sure I was getting veg capsules, and for the second time, received tablets. I read product reviews and see the product formulation has changed. I won't buy it again. I will use a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Sonja M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Formula Changed
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula and it now has magnesium oxide in it. This arrived today and I'm incredibly disappointed. It's also TABLET not capsule. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: AlliFitness

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER CAPSULES?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because it was in capsule form which are easier to swallow and I find more effective. This bottle is large TABLETS. I wonder what they are doing to this product and will update my review when I see if these work as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Bad plan reordering from a previous order without thoroughly reading about a product I’d used/liked
customer_reviews.text: At some point in the last year, they changed the product. I reordered from previous order and all seemed the same (except for almost doubling the price). Upon opening, they’ve changed from capsules to rather LARGE tablets. Really disappointed with the change and will look elsewhere for this supplement in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Daniel

customer_reviews.title: How healthy and important magnesium is for the body and getting enough daily
customer_reviews.text: Researching magnesium and finding out how many products are full of things not good for you and the purest to take is this complex tablet..So far we are feeling pretty good and have only taken it a couple weeks now..Sent a bottle to my brother in law who is having problems with heart palpitations and so he's taking it now and we'll see how fast it helps him to overcome his problem..
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: All of a sudden a new formula & TABLET when they were capsules... NOPE.
customer_reviews.text: Just like many of the other recent reviewers, I had ordered this many times, in capsule form & reordered from my previously ordered link & all of a sudden LARGE TABLETS... new formula... I don’t think so. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: Zhou has now started the tricks of combining their Mag ...
customer_reviews.text: Zhou has now started the tricks of combining their Mag Clycinate with Mag Oxide & its no longer 100% chelated. So everyone beware that its not the same quality Chelated Mag Glycinate with 225 elemental Magnesium in each capsule.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Silently changed to a bad formulation
customer_reviews.text: Used to be just magnesium glycinate in a capsule. Changed it to a mixture of that and magnesium oxide and put it in a large caplet. Tricked me into buying it (just once). Good reviews are from an earlier formulation.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: and I sleep like a baby
customer_reviews.text: This company rocks...I feel such a difference around 5pm. More energy, less bloating, and I sleep like a baby. Would never switch.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: a very overlooked sleep hack
customer_reviews.text: Magnesium is great for sleeping, it works in relation to melatonin, so alot of people take melatonin but you also need magnesium for the full knockout effect. It's included in some sleeping pills but I've found my very sleeping pills never have it. So i take Zhou's to supplement the magnesium and take other sleeping pills for the melatonin/lemon balm/Valerian etc. Its a much needed part of a sleep hacking stack though.
customer_reviews.author: influence peddler

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: If I take more than one capsule per day, I get diarrhea and cramping. Makes me wonder about the quality of this magnesium. (diarrhea is caused when too much of the magnesium is unabsorbed and it reaches your intestines, which then pulls too much water into your stool) Poor absorption = interior quality magnesium.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Batts

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Took two pills last night and got thw worst diarrhea ever
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find out that the product I ordered was not the same formulation that it used to be. In the past it contained just Magnesium Glycinate and now has Magnesium Oxide added. There is no breakdown to how much of each is in the present formulation. The front label looks like the former label and only says, "Mag Glycinate 450." Additionally I had purchased this brand in the past because it came in gelatin capsules that were easy to swallow. The capsules of the new formulation are huge and difficult to swallow. I will not be purchasing this brand again and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A couple of unexpected changes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very satisfied with this product in capsule form. When I received my latest bottle and saw that the mfr had switched to tablets I was not pleased. Then I looked at the ingredients and saw that now Magnesium Oxide is listed as another source. I’m really unhappy about this as it appears Zhou is cutting their costs and degrading a desirable product.
customer_reviews.author: Cowman

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!!
customer_reviews.text: PVC sufferer. Bisoprolol wasn’t working. After 4 days of taking this and another supplement I’ve have officially been pvc free for 3 weeks. I am a firm believer this works and will be taking it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JPREVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Changed the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking this for a year and really liked how it helps me however recently reordered it and I am greatly disappointed. The label looks exactly the same however these are tablets not the capsules that are easier for me to swollen and they have now added magnesium oxide to probably save money. Bottles look exactly the same. I don’t like to be tricked and I will be returning my bottle today!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement. Works well. Very large pill size.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Doesn't bother my GI system. Helped with migraines. The only issue is the size. They're very big. Even splitting them in half leaves them hard to swallow. I've tried splitting them further to make them smaller, but the pills are so soft that the pill cutter makes them crumble into tiny pieces or even powder. They're so soft they can be halved just using my minimal finger strength. If you can take the size I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mathis

customer_reviews.title: I honestly think this brand offers the best magnesium I have tried
customer_reviews.text: The best magnesium I have tried. I changed brand once because the price went up and then for some reason found out this one was at the same price as before and bought it again and when I started taking this one again I really noticed a huge difference in my sleep quality! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna V.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product, Does What it's Supposed to . . .
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this, because I'd never heard of this brand before, but I am extremely happy I did. The capsules are easy to take (no horse-size pills here) and they don't have a smell (bonus!). I have irritable bowel syndrome, so I was concerned about it upsetting my stomach and/or giving me stomach cramps, but I haven't had any problems with that. I have also really noticed a difference in my ability to fall asleep at night and an improvement in my mood overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had been suffering with the most painful cramps in my toes
customer_reviews.text: I had been suffering with the most painful cramps in my toes, feet, behind my knees, and legs that I work up several times every night on the verge of tears. SO UNBEARABLE. I was told about 20 years ago that my body was "screaming for magnesium" by a homeopathic doctor. I blew it off. Since I started taking these my charlie horses have rode out to pasture. My cramps are gone, Gone, GONE!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: torilee

customer_reviews.title: UGH. These pills are HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I have a gastric bypass and these pills need to be broken into several pieces to use. If you are on keto and have muscle cramps these can come in handy, but swallowing shards of a giant pill or god forbid swallowing it whole and having it take up all the space in your belly until it finally dissolves, does not appeal to me personally. There has to be a better way!
customer_reviews.author: E&J BAX

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bait & Switch!!
customer_reviews.text: They have a lot of Mag Oxide in the ingredients, it’s a worse form and cheap! Bait & Switch
customer_reviews.author: Harry Leath

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced marketing sales job on inferior product.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It is not magnesium glycinate as advertised but a mix of magnesium glycinate and magnesium oxide. It causes diarrhea and is poorly absorbed as would be expected with magnesium oxide. They do not indicate the percentage of mag glycinate/oxide on the bottle. However the diarrhea make me feel that there is a substantial percentage of magnesium oxide. Way overpriced for this product. I can take magnesium glycinate without issue. I am a physician and despite reading ad on Amazon and reviews this mix was well hidden with marketing gimmicks. I will be reporting this product to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Eases knee pain and cleans ya pipes!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this product for knee pain..it really has helped a lot. It also helps me fall asleep faster than usual but i have woke up with my heart racing a couple times! Not sure why so i take earlier in the evening. It helps keep ya regular too!! No gross after taste after swallowing either. I love Zhou's products.
customer_reviews.author: The true review gal!

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff, a bit of a heads up. I bought this in terms of helping me sleep and it has worked wonders. I take one pill before bed and within 15 mins I’m knocked out , it’s a bit scary cause I don’t even remember falling asleep lol, don’t take two before bed, I tried that the first day and not only did I knock out but overslept, one is fine .
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Contains cheap magnesium oxide.. grab your toilet paper!
customer_reviews.text: They changed their formula which now contains magnesium oxide. Which is an older cheaper less effective type of magnesium and does not absorb well. Oxide form can also cause loose stools, unlike Glycinate form. Wont buy again, it gave me bad diarrhea. Not sure why they use crap magnesium oxide as a cheap filler?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bacciagalupe

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: This product contains Magnesium Oxide. Not what I wanted. Labeling does not provide any description of % Glycinate vs % Oxide. Very deceptive. Looks like most positive reviews were written before reformulation of this product. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CMikeR

customer_reviews.title: Great product as are most from Zhou!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bottle of magnesium and have been taking one every morning. It’s easy to take and definitely helps keep me regular! I was taking miralax for that but I find the zhou magnesium is great. Also, it helps with electrolytes!
customer_reviews.author: sally rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: They switched the ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for the past year and have been very satisfied, as it was in capsule form. Now it is in tablet form and harder to swallow and digest. However, the main concern is that they company switched the ingredients and added magnesium oxide. Magnesium oxide is a cheap form of magnesium, very common in all brands and for me not well tolerated. What upsets me is the covert way the switch was accomplished. I usually order two bottles and when it was time to open the 2nd bottle I was shocked to see it in tablet form. I read the ingredients and discovered the switch. If I could I would give the product zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality anymore!
customer_reviews.text: The company switched from capsules to tablets which are now of lesser quality. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Canzi

customer_reviews.title: Mag oxide in new formula
customer_reviews.text: So sad they changed the formula and so unethical not to change the label in front! Not pure glycibate and no way to tell how much is now mag oxide. Gotta switch brands but wish I didn’t have this whole jar!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars, but only because the original was awesome
customer_reviews.text: Like several others, I reordered what I believed was chelated magnesium. Upon opening, I found huge tablets and not the customary capsules. Closer inspection of the bottle shows an entirely different product. Contacted Zhou customer service via Facebook messenger several days ago and received no answer. Will be shopping a new brand, which is disappointing because it was once a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Scheerer

customer_reviews.title: Tablets are enormous!!
customer_reviews.text: The tablets are HUGE! I have just wasted $20 because of the inability to swallow a tablet this large. Won’t buy again!
customer_reviews.author: kfletch52k

customer_reviews.title: “Proprietary Blend”
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this new “propriety blend” of Mg Oxide and Mg Glycinate. Go back to your previous product and I’ll buy it. Otherwise, this is trash.
customer_reviews.author: B. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best magnesium’s out there, high quality and will not upset your stomach because it’s magnesium glycinate. A little hard to swallow because they are huge tablets, maybe they can make mini versions of these but other than that, these work great for muscle spasms and for sleep and calming anxious nerves.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Morris

customer_reviews.title: Hate the new, huge tablet form.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product previously when it was in capsule form- it was exactly what my doctor said I needed and in capsule form which is ideal for my comfort. I recently reordered and was so disappointed to find it was reformulated into huge tablets. Magnesium won’t help me if I can’t swallow it and these are now large and uncomfortable to take. Unless taking “horse pills” is your thing, I wouldn’t suggest this product or this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I don’t want this new formula in my body.
customer_reviews.text: Same old crappy treatment of customers. Can’t be trusted. They changed the formula and this is no longer a product I want in MY ONE-OF-A-KIND BODY! 🤬
customer_reviews.author: MaizenBleuSoul

customer_reviews.title: Pills are way too big
customer_reviews.text: These pills are huge. I bought them as they said "tablets" yet I literally choked on trying to get one down. They're not crushable or breakable. Definitely not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Asha Sanders

product_meta.title: Zhou Nutrition Magnesium Glycinate Complex 450 Mg Tablets - Formulated for Calm, High Absorption, Muscle Relax & Gentle Digestion, Vegan, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Soy Free, Bioavailable, 180 Tablets
product_meta.description: Are you getting enough magnesium? An essential mineral, magnesium is more than mother Nature's calming remedy. In fact, magnesium may help support the speed of muscle recovery and repair, improve sleep quality, and support stronger bones and a healthier heart. Zhou’s Mag gluconate 450 is one of the most potent magnesium complexes available, formulated to act quickly without hurting your stomach. Take one serving Daily for best results.
feature_bullets: BETTER MAGNESIUM. Zhou offers one of the highest dosages and superior forms of magnesium available—a magnesium glycinate complex. Unlike standalone magnesium citrate, Zhou's Mag Glycinate 450 complex is formulated with glycine to be easier on your stomach.

MUSCLE RELAXATION & RECOVERY. Formulated to offer fast, efficient bioavailability, Mag Glycinate 450 may help calm and relax muscles for greater comfort, healthy muscle growth, recovery and repair, and even a better night's sleep. Supports against migraine
BONE DENSITY & STRENGTH. Essential to strong, healthy bones, Zhou's magnesium supplement is specially formulated to help support and improve the delivery of calcium to your bones and teeth.

HEART HEALTH & BLOOD SUGAR SUPPORT. Your heart requires more magnesium than any other organ in the body. Magnesium glycate has been studied for its reputed ability to help support a healthy cardiovascular system.

WHAT SETS US APART? At Zhou, we use only the highest-quality ingredients in a facility following GMP (good manufacturing practices). Plus, we test everything at our lab in Utah, so you can be fueling your body with the very best

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
